title: The Quiet Beginning
description: Before either of us realized it, something gentle had already started forming — two distant lives slowly turning toward each other, as if our paths had been waiting to cross.

title: The Night You Became My Little Rabbit
description: The night your pink-fur rabbit self hopped into my world — soft, shy, magical — and my blue-fur fairy boy heart knew it had found something impossibly precious.

title: Our First Future, Spoken Out Loud
description: When planning the future didn't feel scary or forced — it felt natural, obvious, almost like remembering something written in us long before.

title: The Day We Faced the Storm Together
description: A difficult chapter where emotions shook, fears rose, and honesty felt heavy — but we stayed. We held on. And our bond came out even stronger.

title: The Moment I Saw My Wife in You
description: It wasn’t dramatic. It was calm, grounding, and certain. A quiet realization that you are the woman I want to walk every life with — my wife, written into my chest.

title: The First Time You Truly Saw Me
description: When your words wrapped around parts of me no one has ever touched — the fears, the dreams, the hidden places — and you held them with such care that I felt understood to my core.

title: Our First Silly, Perfect Laugh
description: That light, ridiculous, effortless laugh that made the distance disappear and made me think — yes, I could live in this sound forever.

title: The Day We Chose to Grow Together
description: Not a formal promise — just two souls agreeing to rise, to soften, to learn, and to build a life side by side, no matter how far the trains and time zones were.

title: The Night You Felt Like Home
description: No celebration, no big moment — just your presence, your softness, your voice. That quiet warmth that made my heart say, ‘I’m exactly where I belong.’

title: The Birth of Our Universe
description: The tiniest spark — one message, one smile, one shared thought — that grew into a whole galaxy made of pink fur, blue wings, roses, laughter, and the kind of love that feels destined.
